hero.greeting: Hello and welcome to my personal space. My name is
hero.name: Alexis Cattaruzza
hero.title: Junior Full-stack Developer ‚Äî building modern, fast and maintainable interfaces.
hero.summary: Graduated with distinction in Applied Computer Science, I gained hands-on full-stack experience during an internship and a contract at Cronos Europa. I worked on Java / Spring Boot backends and Angular / TypeScript frontends, optimized SQL queries, performed legacy data migrations, integrated the LinkedIn API for automated CV import, and handled post-production bug fixes and maintenance. I am experienced with Docker, Git, testing practices and documentation, and I took a cybersecurity elective during my studies.
hero.objective: Open to any opportunity, I am aiming for a role where I can continuously learn and grow my skills. Preferably a backend, frontend or full-stack position within an Agile product team focused on reusable UI components, performance optimization, CI/CD and DevOps practices, accessibility and robust testing. I want to take on technical ownership, learn through pair programming, and contribute to frontend architecture decisions.

timeline.title: Journey
timeline.hover_instruction: Hover over the points to discover the details

contract.description: Post-delivery intervention: bug fixes, maintenance and optimization. LinkedIn API integration for automated CV import, SQL query optimization and system performance improvement.

internship.description: Development and delivery of full-stack user stories: front, back, database and documentation. Legacy data migration to structured schema. SQL function creation for calculations and query optimization.

studies.role: Bachelor in Computer Science & Application Development
studies.description: Degree obtained with distinction. Web specialization, final project and cybersecurity elective. Full-stack development oriented training and best practices (architecture, testing).

retail.description: Customer service experience, cash management and store restocking.
